name: DisordersOfVisualCortex
title: Disorders of Visual Cortex
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of disorders of visual cortex.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of a disorder of visual cortex, including inflammatory disorders, neoplasm, and cortical blindness.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')

concept.display: Visual cortex disorder due to neoplasm (disorder)
Visual cortex disorder due to vascular disorder (disorder)
Cortical blindness of right side of brain (disorder)
Cortical blindness of left side of brain (disorder)
Cortical blindness, intellectual disability, polydactyly syndrome (disorder)
Cortical blindness, right side of brain
Cortical blindness, left side of brain
